common.company_description: A cozy hotel in the mountains of Beldersay, Uzbekistan, offering winter transfers to ski resorts and summer hikes along scenic trails, along with relaxing by the pool with stunning views.

about.company_subtitle_3: Azure Resort offers a unique combination of adventure and relaxation, with winter transfers to ski resorts, summer hikes in the scenic mountains of Beldersay, and luxurious amenities for an unforgettable stay.

process.title: Process
process.choose_a_product_desc: Browse our selection of cozy rooms and suites, tailored for your perfect mountain getaway.
process.come_in_contact_desc: Our team is here to assist you with reservations or any questions you may have.
process.enjoy_driving_desc: Relax in the comfort of our resort and indulge in the scenic beauty around you.
process.process_info: If this is your first time visiting Azure Resort, we’ll guide you every step of the way.

faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question_1: What activities are available during winter?
faq.answer_1: We offer transfers to nearby ski resorts and assistance with winter sports activities.
faq.question_2: What can I do during summer at Azure Resort?
faq.answer_2: You can enjoy hiking scenic mountain trails, swimming in the pool, and relaxing with stunning views.
faq.answer_3: Yes, free high-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort.
faq.question_4: How can I book a room?
faq.answer_4: Rooms can be booked through our website, by phone, or by email.
faq.answer_5: Please check with us when booking, as pet policies may vary.

talk.dont_hesitate: Don't hesitate and send us a message.

footer.about_description: Discover the beauty of the mountains with Azure Resort – your gateway to unforgettable adventures and relaxation.
footer.subscribe_description: Want to stay updated on our offers and services? Sign up and receive updates directly to your email.
